tags.name: lrnsys-comment
tags.description:
`lrnsys-comment`
A well styled comment for a user with markdown support.

Events:

  * `comment-reply` - 

  * `comment-like` - 

  * `comment-delete-dialog` - 

  * `comment-editing` - 

  * `comment-save` - 

Attributes:

  * `comment` - 

  * `display-name` {`string`} - 

  * `comment-new` {`string`} - 

  * `hover-class` {`string`} - 

  * `editform` {`boolean`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `comment` - 

  * `displayName` {`string`} - 

  * `commentNew` {`string`} - 

  * `hoverClass` {`string`} - 

  * `editform` {`boolean`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - 

  * `_template` {`HTMLTemplateElement | null`} - 

  * `_importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `rootPath` {`string`} - 

  * `importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `root` {`HTMLElement | ShadowRoot | StampedTemplate | null`} - 

  * `$` - 

  * `PROPERTY_EFFECT_TYPES` -

tags.name: lrnsys-comment-list
tags.description:
`lrnsys-comment-list`

Events:

  * `simple-modal-show` - 

  * `simple-toast-show` - 

Attributes:

  * `csrf-token` {`string`} - CSRF Token

  * `ops-request-method` - Request methods

  * `active-comment` - Comment currently in scope

  * `new-comment` - New stub comment from backend.

  * `comments` - An object containing all comments to render in the list

  * `source-path` {`string`} - Source to pull the comments from

  * `comment-ops-base` {`string`} - Base for ops calls

  * `create-stub-url` {`string`} - Source to get stub comments from

  * `req-url` {`string`} - Source for CRUD ops against individual comments.

Properties:

  * `csrfToken` {`string`} - CSRF Token

  * `opsRequestMethod` - Request methods

  * `activeComment` - Comment currently in scope

  * `newComment` - New stub comment from backend.

  * `comments` - An object containing all comments to render in the list

  * `sourcePath` {`string`} - Source to pull the comments from

  * `commentOpsBase` {`string`} - Base for ops calls

  * `createStubUrl` {`string`} - Source to get stub comments from

  * `reqUrl` {`string`} - Source for CRUD ops against individual comments.

  * `_template` {`HTMLTemplateElement | null`} - 

  * `_importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `rootPath` {`string`} - 

  * `importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `root` {`HTMLElement | ShadowRoot | StampedTemplate | null`} - 

  * `$` - 

  * `PROPERTY_EFFECT_TYPES` -
